snippet: More newly married couples are choosing to take their loved ones with them on what has come to be called a buddymoon.
abstract: Alyson Krueger essay comments on phenomenon of more newly married couples choosing to take relatives and friends with them on their honeymoon; so-called buddymoons offer a chance for loved ones to come together to continue the celebrate and take a vacation.
lead_paragraph: More newly married couples are choosing to take their loved ones with them on what has come to be called a buddymoon.

headline.main: Three’s No Longer a Crowd For Newlyweds on a ‘Buddymoon’
headline.print_headline: Three’s No Longer a Crowd For Newlyweds on a ‘Buddymoon’
